content: this legal document provides a summary of a legal case without mentioning specific names it is related to a cost procedure and discusses the valuation and division of matrimonial property shares the judge emphasizes that being listed in the share register does not prove individual ownership especially in cases of joint property the document also mentions the application of a discount for minority interests when valuing shares and the need for a nuanced approach in assessing ownership and valuation the parties involved are referred to as db councillor mrs ad and loco whr vl the document concludes by stating that the principles of internal dispute resolution are fully applied in the liquidation and partition process including the valuation of shares
